view_description: Provides a summary of all the notification
sql_query: CREATE VIEW vwBCUAlarms AS SELECT * FROM NotificationLog WHERE MessageCode LIKE '%alarm%'

columns.column_description: unique identifier for each notification record
source system or device generating the notification
code representing the location where the event occurred
type of notification such as ALARM or INFO
category of the message, e.g., FAILURE or WARNING
priority level of the notification such as HIGH or LOW
code representing the workflow or message type
detailed description of the notification or alarm
date and time when the notification was generated
timestamp when the record was created in the system
